did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Hermann M. Biggs Memorial Hospital records, 1936-1956.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, administrative papers, annual reports, records and logbooks, memoranda, statistical data, and a scrapbook of newspaper clippings pertaining to the operation of a tuberculosis sanatorium in Ithaca, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, administrative papers, annual reports, records and logbooks, memoranda, statistical data, and a scrapbook of newspaper clippings pertaining to the operation of a tuberculosis sanatorium in Ithaca, New York.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Tuberculosis -- Hospitals and sanatoriums -- New York (State) -- Ithaca.
Sanatoriums -- New York (State) -- Ithaca.
Hospitals -- New York (State) -- Ithaca.
Hospitals
Sanatoriums
Tuberculosis -- Hospitals

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Information obtained from these records may not be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual patient mentioned in the records can be identified.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Hermann M. Biggs Memorial Hospital. Records, #1727. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
